overview.en: Smart Farm, which is developed by combining ICT and robot science and technology such as big data, artificial intelligence, and internet is trending in Korea and abroad as one of the measures to cope with changes in agriculture due to climate change and solve rural and agricultural problems. Smart Farm is develops and distributes models, develops R&D projects, and expands domestic and overseas markets continuously, enabling production and demand prediction in the market through collecting data on crop growth and AI-based analysis.
